definitions.text: relating to or caused by structure, especially political or economic structure
examples: structural unemployment in a technological society

definitions.text: relating to or having or characterized by structure
affecting or involved in structure or construction
examples: the structural details of a house such as beams and joists and rafters; not ornamental elements

definitions.text: concerned with systematic structure in a particular field of study

examples: geomorphological features of the Black Hills
structural effects of folding and faulting of the earth's surface

definitions.text: relating to or concerned with the morphology of plants and animals
